TopicTitle: Read This Urgent but (Unrelated to KSP) News!

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dmQN93NqqDM&feature=g-all-lik&context=G254d710FAAAAAAAABAA

Look at this insane crap. They just keep trying, and we must stop them! Spread the word!

P.S please just move this thread to its appropriate place if I posted it in the wrong one!
This was put up at the beginning of December. I presume it\'s old news, and went down with SOPA/PIPA.
Silly you. SOPA and PIPA are not dead, not in the least. They just got delayed. ACTA, as far as I can tell, still hasn\'t even been slowed down.

ACTA has been EnACTAd unfortunately already.

The US signed it back in October.
